what is the admission process in your university
responses:
1. Fill the form (Last Date - 31th july) 
 2. Submit documents (Aadhaar, 10th Marksheet, 12th Marksheet, Migration Certificate, Transfer Certicate, Caste Certificate(SC/ST/OBC))) 
 3. Pay the Course & Hostel fee 
 4. Fill The anti-ragging form 
 5. Admission Successfully completed
